text: Bethesda Christian School is a private K-12 Christian school located in Fort Worth, Texas. Bethesda Christian School started in 1980. ==References== ==External links== * Bethesda Christian School website Category:Christian schools in Texas Category:Private high schools in Fort Worth, Texas Category:Private high schools in Texas Category:Private middle schools in Texas Category:Private elementary schools in Texas
title: Bethesda Christian School (Fort Worth, Texas)
